p: Colorimetric methods were used to determine the levels of different enzymatic antioxidants. SOD activity was assessed using the oxidizing reaction of nitroblue tetrazolium (NBT) as previously reported by Beyer and Fridovich (1987). CAT activity was measured using H 2O 2 as reported by Aebi (1984). GPx activity was measured using H 2O 2 as substrate and reduced GSH as published by Flohe and GÃ¼nzler (1984).
